channel.title: Need help with runserver
channel.description:
whenever i try to run my server i get this:
Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:80 npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. item.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. config\objects.cfg: file not found. Summon.cfg: Not Found. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at Summoning.LoadMonsters(Summoning.java:190) at Summoning.<init>(Summoning.java:32) at SkillHandler.<init>(SkillHandler.java:11) at server.main(server.java:34)

item.title: Need help with runserver
item.dc:creator: @ludapwnzu ludapwnzu
item.description:
@ludapwnzu wrote:

i just did that but same errors
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2007, 02:29:42 PM[/size][hr]what should i do?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with runserver
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Are all of your .cfg’s outside of a folder within the server folder? And objects.cfg has to be in a folder(within the server folder) called config.

Read full topic
